= Units and Constants =

== SI defining constants ==

| Constant                                 | Value                                               |
| *Hyperfine transition frequency of Cs*   | $\Delta v_{Cs} = 9.19 \cdot 10^{9}~\mathrm{s^{-1}}$ |
| *Speed of light in vacuum*               | $c = 3.00 \cdot 10^{8}~\mathrm{m \cdot s^{-1}}$     |
| *Planck constant*                        | $h = 6.63 \cdot 10^{-34}~\mathrm{J \cdot s}$        |
| *Elementary charge*                      | $e = 1.60 \cdot 10^{-19}~\mathrm{C}$                |
| *Boltzmann constant*                     | $k_b = 1.38 \cdot 10^{-23}~\mathrm{J \cdot K^{-1}}$ |
| *Avogadro constant*                      | $N_A = 6.02 \cdot 10^{23}~\mathrm{mol^{-1}}$        |
| *Luminous efficacy of 540 Thz radiation* | $K_{cd} = 683~\mathrm{lm \cdot W^{-1}}$             |

== SI Base Units ==

| Measurement         | Unit               | Symbol         | Value                                                                                                |
|---------------------|--------------------|----------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Time                | *Second*           | $\mathrm{s}$   | $9.19 \cdot 10^{9}\frac{1}{\Delta v_{Cs}}$                                                           |
| Length              | *Metre*            | $\mathrm{m}$   | $\frac{9.19 \cdot 10^{9}}{3.00 \cdot 10^{8}}\frac{c}{\Delta v_{Cs}}$                                 |
| Mass                | *Kilogram*         | $\mathrm{kg}$  | $\frac{(3.00 \cdot 10^{8})^2}{(6.63 \cdot 10^{-34})(9.19 \cdot 10^{9})}\frac{h\Delta v_{Cs}}{{c^2}}$ |
| Electric Current    | *Ampere*           | $\mathrm{A}$   | $\frac{1}{(1.60 \cdot 10^{-19})(9.19 \cdot 10^{9})}e\Delta v_{Cs}$                                   |
| Temperature         | *Kelvin*           | $\mathrm{K}$   | $\frac{1.38 \cdot 10^{-23}}{(6.63 \cdot 10^{-34})(9.19 \cdot 10^{9})}\frac{h\Delta v_{Cs}}{k_b}$     |
| Amount of substance | *Mole*             | $\mathrm{mol}$ | $\frac{1}{6.02 \cdot 10^{23}}N_A$                                                                    |
| Luminous intensity  | *Candela*          | $\mathrm{cd}$  | $\frac{1}{683(6.63 \cdot 10^{-34})(9.19 \cdot 10^{9})^2}K_{cd}h(\Delta v_{Cs})^2$                    |

== Other Constants ==

| Constant                                   | Value                                                                     |
|--------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| *Acceleration of free fall on Earth*       | $g = 9.81~\mathrm{m \cdot s^{-2}}$                                        |
| *Gravitational Constant*                   | $G = 6.67 \cdot 10^{-11}~\mathrm{N \cdot m^2 \cdot kg^{-2}}$              |
| *Coulomb constant*                         | $k_e = 8.99 \cdot 10^{9}~\mathrm{N \cdot m^2 \cdot C^{-2}}$               |
| *Speed of sound under standard conditions* | $v = 343~\mathrm{m \cdot s^{-1}}$                                         |
| *Stefanâ€“Boltzmann constant*                | $\sigma = 5.67 \cdot 10^{-8}~\mathrm{W \cdot m^{-2} \cdot K^{-4}}$        |
| *Permittivity constant*                    | $\epsilon_0 = 8.85 \cdot 10^{-12}~\mathrm{C^2 \cdot N^{-1} \cdot m^{-2}}$ |

== Other Units ==

| Measurement | Unit               | Symbol        | Value                             |
|-------------|--------------------|---------------|-----------------------------------|
| Mass        | *Atomic unit mass* | $\mathrm{u}$  | $1.66 \cdot 10^{-27}~\mathrm{kg}$ |
| Energy      | *Electronvolt*     | $\mathrm{eV}$ | $1.60 \cdot 10^{-19}~\mathrm{J}$  |
